choices.text:
### Human:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for today presuming no dietary restrictions.
### Assistant:

I have created the following menu. I hope you enjoy it!

    - Breakfast - Oatmeal with banana and blueberries, coffee or tea (your choice) 
        - Calories = 300 calories 

      - Lunch  - Tuna salad sandwich on whole wheat bread, apple slices   (Calories= 400 )
         - Dinner: Chicken stir fry over brown rice. Served w/steamed broccoli and carrots

    - Snack - 1 cup of low fat cottage cheese, 2 cups of grapes (calories = 200) 

      - Total Calories for the day : 1200 calories
